title: Gambling Stocks Fall as NFL Predictions Gain on Sportsbooks
description: DraftKings Inc., Flutter Entertainment PLC and other stocks linked to the sports gambling industry tumbled on Friday after new data suggested that they may be losing ground to competing products from prediction market startups.
content: DraftKings Inc., Flutter Entertainment PLC and other stocks linked to the sports gambling industry tumbled on Friday after new data suggested that they may be losing ground to competing products from prediction market startups.
